bot_arg.coffee: drink coffee if stamina is low during fish fight
bot_arg.alcohol: drink alcohol before keeping the fish
bot_arg.refill: consume tea and carrot if hunger or comfort is low
bot_arg.harvest: harvest baits before casting the rod
bot_arg.lure: change current lure with a random favorite one, mode: spin
bot_arg.mouse: move mouse randomly before casting the rod
bot_arg.pause: pause the script before casting the rod occasionally
bot_arg.random_cast: do a redundant rod cast randomly
bot_arg.lift: lift the tackle constantly during a fish fight
bot_arg.electro: enable electric mode for Electro Raptor series reel
bot_arg.gear_ratio: switch the gear ratio or mode after the retrieval timed out
bot_arg.bite: save a screenshot in screenshots/ when a fish bite
bot_arg.screenshot: save a screenshot in screenshots/ after you caught a fish
bot_arg.email: send email noticication after the script stop
bot_arg.miaotixing: send miaotixing notification after the script stop
bot_arg.discord: send Discord notification after the script stop
bot_arg.telegram: send Telegram notification after the script stop
bot_arg.shutdown: shutdown computer after the script stop
bot_arg.signout: sign out instead of closing the game
bot_arg.broken_lure: replace broken lures with favorite ones
bot_arg.dry_mix: enable dry mix refill, mode: bottom
bot_arg.no_animation:
disable waiting for trophy and gift animations, gift
change 'Catch screen style' to 'Simple' in game settings to use this flag
help.pid: specify the id of the profile to use
help.pname: specify the name of the profile to use
help.fishes_in_keepnet: specify the number of fishes in your keepnet, (default: %(default)s)
help.trolling:
enable trolling mode and specify the direction
(default: %(default)s, no argument: %(const)s)
help.rainbow:
enable rainbow line mode and specify the meter to lift the rod
(default: %(default)s, no argument: %(const)s)
help.boat_ticket:
enable boat ticket renewal and specify the duration
(default: %(default)s, no argument: %(const)s)
help.discard: discard all the crafted items (for groundbaits)
help.craft_limit: specify the number of items to craft, (default: %(default)s)
help.shift: Hold down the Shift key while moving
help.refill: refill hunger and comfort by consuming tea and carrot
select_feature: Select a feature to start ðŸš€
prompt.enter_fid: Enter feature id to use, h to see help message, q to quit.
prompt.enter_launch_options: Enter launch options, Enter to skip, h to see help message, q to quit.
prompt.language: What's your game language? [(1) en (2) ru (3) q (quit)]
prompt.click_lock: Is Windows Mouse ClickLock enabled? [(1) yes (2) no (3) q (quit)]
incompatible_config:
Incompatible config version, some settings has been removed or deprecated
You can delete it to allow the bot to create a new one
Alternatively, see the CHANGELOG to modify config.yaml
